comments:
Smoke:Eclispe 3.0: Can not create template report item.

Steps:
1.Drag a label into layout
2.Select the label, right clight the mouse, select "Create Template Report Item..."
3.Click "Ok" button

Expected Results:
1.Can create template report item.

The repaint sequence in GEF 3.0 is different with GEF 3.1. In GEF 3.0 repaint sequence
causes the lable figure get a null string. That cuases the NPE. Set that null string to blank string "" 
to avoid exception.
